original_text: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
korean_text: 그러나 너는 배우고 확신한 일에 거하라 너는 네가 누구에게서 배운 것을 알며

sentences.original_text: But continue thou in the things
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 너는 그것들 안에 계속 머물라

sentences.original_text: knowing of whom thou hast learned them
